item.description:
I'm thinking most might already have New Year's Eve plans, but for those who don't, can come and check out Soulive, a nice jazz group that has done collabos with The Roots and Talib Kweli.

Here's an example of a couple of my favorites from them:

Cash's Dream: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n0tNIpeS0A8

Uncle Junior: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=voa_iqU8azs


Paradise has a cafe/lounge area before you get to the main stage, so that would be a good place to meet up before the show, maybe around 8pm

Tickets are $40 and can be obtained here (clearly you have the New Year's Eve fee in effect, they are also performing Sun 12/30 for $20, but I can't attend that one, so I will be here NYE):

http://www.ticketmaster.com/event/01004926B0FC7702?c=rmk-lnneweng_web_soulive_dise_092912

If you don't have plans for this night, and like what you hear, come check it out!
item.name: Soulive Concert at Paradise Rock Club NYE
